myAvibase

MyAvibase允许您创建和管理您的个人鸟种记录，并为您的下一次观鸟旅行提供有用的报告。

  • myAvibase主页
  • 管理个人鸟种记录
  • 管理观鸟记录
  • myAvibase报告
名录

Avibase中包含了超过12,000个地区名录，并以9种分类系统展示，包括超过175种语言的异名。每个名录都可以显示观鸟者分享的图片，并可以以PDF格式打印用于野外观察。

  • Avibase名录
搜索
  • Avibase搜索
  • 按科浏览
贡献

您可以通过以下几种方式帮助本页面的开发，如加入拍摄照片的Flickr群组或为本站提供其它语言的翻译。

密码:

斑鼠鸟
Colius striatus Gmelin, JF, 1789
摘要   taxon grid   地图   eBird   Wikipedia   NatureServe   ITIS   Birdlife   Flickr   音频   更多链接


photo ©Derek Keats
(2 votes)
照片由 flickr.com 提供。


目:
  Coliiformes
科:
  Coliidae
属:
  Colius

学名:
  Colius striatus

引文:
  Gmelin, JF, 1789

参考文献:
  Syst.Nat. 1 pt2 p.843

原名:
  Colius striatus

Avibase ID:
  1FDDABDB0D4421F9

Taxomic Serial Number:
TSN: 554666

Geographic range:

  • Colius striatus striatus: S Cape Province east to Great Kei River (South Africa)
  • Colius striatus nigricollis: Nigeria to Cameroon, Gabon and sw Congo
  • Colius striatus minor: eastern South Africa (south to KwaZulu-Natal), Swaziland, and extreme southern Mozambique
  • Colius striatus integralis: southeastern Zimbabwe, northeastern South Africa, and southern Mozambique (south to Delagoa Bay)
  • Colius striatus simulans: Lower Zambezi valley in Mozambique and Malawi
  • Colius striatus rhodesiae: Highlands of e Zimbabwe and adjacent Mozambique
  • Colius striatus affinis: Zimbabwe to Malawi, n Mozambique, s and coastal Tanzania
  • Colius striatus mombassicus: S Somalia to coastal Kenya and ne Tanzania (south to Amani)
  • Colius striatus cinerascens: W and s Tanzania
  • Colius striatus berlepschi: N Malawi to ne Zambia and sw Tanzania
  • Colius striatus kikuyensis: Cent. Kenya and high rainfall areas of peripheral n Tanzania
  • Colius striatus kiwuensis: eastern Democratic Republic of the Congo to Uganda, Rwanda, and northwestern Tanzania
  • Colius striatus congicus: eastern Angola to southern Democratic Republic of the Congo and northwestern Zambia
  • Colius striatus jebelensis: South Sudan and northern Uganda
  • Colius striatus leucotis: E Sudan to w and sw Ethiopia
  • Colius striatus hilgerti: NE Ethiopia, sw Djibouti and nw Somalia
  • Colius striatus leucophthalmus: northeastern Democratic Republic of the Congo to South Sudan and southeastern Central African Republic
  • 显示更多……
Source: Clements checklist

      • Colius striatus cinerascens (marangu)
    • Colius striatus berlepschi

      • Colius striatus kiwuensis (kiwuensis)
      • Colius striatus kiwuensis (ugandensis)
    • ▼Colius striatus congicus
      • Colius striatus congicus (congicus)
      • Colius striatus congicus (lungae)
    • Colius striatus jebelensis
